import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; const EditTask=({task, index, taskList, setTaskList}) => { const [editModal, setEditModal]= useState(false); const [projectName, setProjectName]= useState(""); const [taskDescription, setTaskDescription]= useState(""); const handleInput= e =>{ const name=e.target.name; const value=e.target.value; if (name === "projectName") setProjectName(value) if (name=== "taskDescription") setTaskDescription(value) } const handleUpdate= e => { e.preventDefault(); let taskIndex=taskList.indexOf(task); taskList.splice(taskIndex, 1); setTaskList( [...taskList, {projectName, taskDescription}] ); setEditModal(false); setProjectName(""); setTaskDescription(""); } return( <> {editModal ? ( <>

Edit Task
